description: Try our easy to follow Bread & Butter Pudding with Marmalade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bread & Butter Pudding with Marmalade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the butter with the cinnamon and nutmeg and spread on both sides of the bread. Cut each slice into triangles.
Arrange 1/2 the bread over the base of a 3L oven proof dish.
Sprinkle with 1/2 the sultanas and 1/2 the sugar. Arrange the remaining bread on top and sprinkle the remaining sultanas and sugar.
Whisk together the eggs, milk, cream and vanilla and pour mixture over the bread, pressing down gently to cover bread completely.
Place dish in a roasting pan and pour in enough boiling water to come half way up the dish.
Place in the oven and cook for 30 minutes or until custard has cooked.
Meanwhile, warm the marmalade gently in a saucepan.
Remove pudding from oven and gently spoon the marmalade over the top and return to oven for a further 5-10 minutes.
Serve with ice cream or cream.
